Mandate: Serve corporate and retail customers, provide trade finance, and comply with AML/CFT requirements.
TopPriorities: Support mining and export clients while managing foreign exchange exposures.
Integrate tax compliance checks for large VAT refund clients.
Expand digital onboarding for SME exporters in the region.
ActiveOperations: Trade finance desk managing outward remittances tied to ZRA export declarations.
AML alert review team working with Financial Intelligence Centre on suspicious transfers.
SME mentoring program to help companies prepare accurate VAT returns.

RecentActions.Summary: Implemented advanced transaction monitoring to detect and report suspicious activities.

Integrate tax compliance checks for large VAT refund clients.
Expand digital onboarding for SME exporters in the region.
ActiveOperations: Trade finance desk managing outward remittances tied to ZRA export declarations.
AML alert review team working with Financial Intelligence Centre on suspicious transfers.
SME mentoring program to help companies prepare accurate VAT returns.

RecentActions.Title: Enhanced AML monitoring systems
RecentActions.Summary: Implemented advanced transaction monitoring to detect and report suspicious activities.

RecentActions.Title: Compliance roundtable with corporate clients
RecentActions.Summary: Shared best practices on document retention to support future audits.
